SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Imprints relative to Crimson Quill Publishing?
SRP.A: Zenith Imprints is {above} Crimson Quill Publishing in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total book sales?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Crimson Quill Publishing}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total book sales?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Azure Ink Works}.

NC.Q: Between 1987 and 1991, did the total Book Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 1990?
NC.A: The change in total book sales between 1987 and 1991 was {larger} than between 1985 and 1990.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2002, was the average total Book Sales higher or lower than between 1988 and 1992?
NC.A: The average total book sales between 2000 and 2002 was {higher} than between 1988 and 1992.

NC.Q: Between 1994 and 2001, was the average total Book Sales higher or lower than between 1991 and 1993?
NC.A: The average total book sales between 1994 and 2001 was {higher} than between 1991 and 1993.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1990, did the total Book Sales experience a larger or smaller change than between 1986 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total book sales between 1985 and 1990 was {larger} than between 1986 and 1989.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Crimson Quill Publishing} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Azure Ink Works, Borealis Books, Scrolls of Meridian, Aura Literary Press, Crimson Quill Publishing, Zenith Imprints}.
